characteristics.name: Intellectual Curiosity
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as a genuine interest in exploring complex ideas and sharing daily magic.

options.description: Tends to ask probing questions and seek out new information.
Approaches problems with a logical and methodical mindset.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a direct and honest approach to sharing their thoughts and opinions.

options.description: Tends to be straightforward and to-the-point in their communication.
Often adds complexity and depth to their messages.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Values authenticity and connection with others, often seeking out meaningful conversations.

options.description: Tends to offer encouragement and support to those around them.
Prioritizes individuality and autonomy in their relationships.

characteristics.name: Creativity
characteristics.description: Consistently expresses a strong creative streak, evident in their artwork and daily posts.

options.description: Tends to think outside the box and explore new ideas.
Often focuses on applying practical skills and techniques.

characteristics.name: Philosophical Orientation
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a philosophical mindset, often exploring complex ideas and questioning the status quo.

options.description: Tends to approach life with a positive and hopeful outlook.
Often expresses skepticism and doubt about certain aspects of life.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Values authenticity in emotional expression, often sharing their feelings and thoughts openly.

options.description: Tends to be open and honest about their emotions.

characteristics.name: Interests
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a strong interest in art, music, and other creative pursuits.

options.description: Tends to explore new interests and hobbies.
Often focuses on specific areas of interest.

characteristics.name: Values
characteristics.description: Prioritizes authenticity, creativity, and individuality in their values.

options.description: Tends to value established norms and conventions.
Often expresses a desire for change and progress.
